summary: This is an upscale and re-texture of the female Elven armour, giving it a nice glossy coat of black paint. Maximum gloss! Maximum shine!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Have you ever wanted some jet black shiny armour? Well now you have it![/b][/center]

This is a part upscale, part re-drawing and re-texture of the Elven Armour for females, giving it a thick coat of glossy black paint! Maximum gloss! Maximum shine!

[u]What it does[/u]: Replaces the textures for female elven armour cuirass, gloves, boots & gauntlets and human female helmet (no Khajit or Argonian at the moment and no males - if there is interest however I will do those as well).

[u]What it doesn\'t do[/u]: Change any of the mesh files (so it will work with any armour replacer like UNP / CBBE / etc conversions)


[u]Installation instructions[/u]:

Download and install with NMM

or

Unzip the file into ../skyrim/data


[u]Manual Uninstallation[/u]:

Delete the following files

../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/f/cuirass.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/f/cuirass_m.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/f/cuirass_n.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/boots_d.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/boots_m.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/boots_n.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/gauntlets_d.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/gauntlets_m.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/gauntlets_n.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/helmet_d.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/helmet_m.dds
../skyrim/data/textures/armor/elven/m/helmet_n.dds



[u]Future plans for this mod[/u]:

Edit the Elven Armour mesh itself to give it a bit more kick.
author: Jyonny
